questions.question: Wie is die persoon of organisasie wat die aksie in gedien het?
questions.description: Name, ouderdomme, adresse, ander persoonlike inligting.

questions.question: Is dit moontlik dat hierdie geding tot landmerkaksie sal lei? Skep dit 'n presedent?
Is dit moontlik dat die saak buite die hof geskik sal word?
Wat is die betekenis van die aksie en die gevolge daarvan op ander?
Wat is die name van die prokureurs aan beide kante? (Kontroleer spelling!)
Wanneer is die verhoor en wie is die voorsittende regter?
Wat is die agtergrond van die eiser of aansoeker: die persoon wat die aksie in gedien het?
Wat is die agtergrond van die verweeder of respondent?
Watter tipe skade word beweer?
Wat is die verlangde uitkoms?
Op watter datum is die aansoek ingedien en watter hof het jurisdiksie?
Is daar 'n spesifieke motivering agter die aksie (indien enige)?
Wat is die agtergrond tot die konflik/meningsverskil?
Is of was daar enige soortgelyke beslissings deur howe (presedente)?
Additional Info/Notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
Who is the person or organisation filing the action?
questions.description: Names, ages, addresses, other personal information.

questions.question: Could this suit lead to a landmark action? Is it a precedent?
Is there a possibility of an out-of-court settlement?
What is the significance of the action and the effect on others?
What are the names of the lawyers for both sides? (Check spelling!)
What is the date and who is the presiding judge for the trial or hearing?
What is the background of the plaintiff or petitioner: the person filing the action?
What is the background of the defendant or respondent?
What type of damage is alleged?
What is the outcome being sought?
What is the date of filing of the application and which is the court of jurisdiction?
Is there a special motivation behind the action (if any)?
What is the background to the conflict/disagreement?
Are there or have there been any similar cases decided by courts (precedents)?
Additional Info/Notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
